description: Easy to understand with simple syntax and learning curve to get use of most of the functions I need for university physics and math. Very happy with the support as well, responded fast and bugfixes as well as adding new features was done really fast. Even adding the package to Ubuntu repository for Snap packages done really fast! Thank you for making a great application.
summary: Great for math and physics students!

description: I have been ising this for over a year. Perfect!
summary: The best software for math typing
